text: On LIS we fixed this by changing the wording on our cookie-details page from 'Continue' to 'Return to application' as the phrase Continue was too generic to inform users of where they would be redirected
On Matex Apply we included the phrase '(opens in new tab)' after links that open in a tab to inform the users that they will be taken away from the journey
On Matex Register, we found that the skip link kept going to our phase that was on every page. To fix this we moved the phase banner outside of the main content

On PPC Online we found that the session-timeout module was not working correctly due to a bug from upgrading to NHSUK Frontend Toolkit v.9.4.0. We made contact with the Toolkit team who fixed this with the release of v.9.50
